Description_lang: Summons a Invoked Flaming Spirit that fixates on a target.  When the Spirit reaches its target it causes a Supernova, inflicting $75238s1 Fire damage in a $75238A1 yard radius around the Spirit.
AuraDescription_lang: Summons a Invoked Flaming Spirit that fixates on a target.  When the Spirit reaches its target it causes a Supernova, inflicting $75238s1 Fire damage in a $75238A1 yard radius around the Spirit.
